title: Final Exam Schedule (General) | UIC Office of the Registrar
text: Note: Tentative times listed on this page are for all colleges except the health sciences professional colleges.
For the complete Final Exam Schedule, visit the final exams page for the current term. If the current exam schedule is not available, you can view past schedules on the calendars page.
Final exam scheduling is standardized but varies from semester to semester. Review the list below for an overview of course scheduling on a per semester basis.

Note: Instructors of courses with non-traditional meeting schedules should contact the Office of Classroom Scheduling to arrange for exam locations. Contact the Office of Classroom Scheduling at (312) 413-3640 (e-mail classroomscheduling@uic.edu). Selected courses follow the combined section exam schedule, most follow the general schedule.
Final examinations are scheduled according to the time and day(s) the class meets, and the type of class (lecture, lecture discussion, quiz or laboratory):
